item.title: Junior Full Stack Engineer
item.description: As a Junior Full Stack Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will be involved in both backend and front end development.
Payments for Programmers

item.title: Payment Gateway for Card Payments
item.description: We provide smooth payments for Visa and Mastercard. Via the PayFunc Payment Gateway you can reach a wide network of acquirers and optimize your card acceptance.

item.title: Payments for Programmers
item.description: PayFunc provides easy to integrate solutions for payments and monetary transactions for your web and app based needs.

item.title: General
item.description: This details the general usage of the PayFunc API.

item.title: PayFunc Checkout
item.description: The PayFunc Checkout is perfect for e-commerce applications where the end user checks out after having selected items into a virtual shopping cart.

item.title: Alternative Payment Methods for the Nordics
item.description: Increase Your revenue with alternative payment methods. Instant payment and invoice based payments like Swish and Mash grow rapidly in the Nordics. A wider payment portfolio can increase Your revenue significantly.

item.title: Junior UX Specialist
item.description: As a Junior User Experience Specialist you will be a part of our growing development team. Your work will be focused on improving the usabilibty of our products.

item.title: Example JS
item.description: const response = await fetch("https://api.payfunc.com/order", { method: "POST", headers: { Authentication: "Bearer <public api key>" } body: JSON.stringify( { "number": "<unique order identifier>", "items": 1337.42, "currency": "EUR", "payment": { "type": "card", "account": "<account id>" } } ) }

item.title: Order
item.description: The order endpoint is the primary endpoint used for creating and administrating orders.

item.title: PayFunc Onboard
item.description: PayFunc Onboard guides your users through the process of creating an account used for later transactions. It handles the full process of entering the credit card information as well as performing the full 3D secure authentication procedure. Once everything is done you will receive an account number that you then can use to perform payments towards the user’s credit card without the need for any interaction with the user.

item.title: Payment
item.description: The payment endpoint is used to create payments that require some kind user authentication. The resulting payment can then be used when creating an order.

item.title: Order
item.description: When creating orders, the Creatable Order datatype is used. In the response from the endpoint an object of the Order data type will be returned.

item.title: Developer Focus
item.description: We put programmers first. That is why all your integration questions are answered by our developers directly. No first line support staff to try to get past.

item.title: High Risk Merchants
item.description: A high risk merchant account is a payment processing account for businesses that are classified as high risk services by banks, such as airplane tickets, online services, gaming, crypto currencies, insurance products, etc.. We help high risk merchants to find right payment methods for their site. Contact us and we tell You more.

item.title: Merchant Portal
item.description: We offer an extensive reporting platform and back office portal allowing merchants to run report and to administer their payments wherever they are via a simple web interface.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer with Payments Expertice
item.description: As a Senior Software Engineer with Payments Expertice you will be a key part of growing our development team. Not only will you be an individual contributer but you will also coach junior engineers to become more skilled and productive.

item.title: Customer
item.description: Data type representing a customer.

item.title: Fraud Management
item.description: PayFunc uses the latest technology and services in anti fraud technology in order to protect our contracted clients and all card users. Let us be your expertise partner in helping your company maximize profit and minimize losses.

item.title: Junior iOS & Android Engineer
item.description: As a Junior iOS & Android Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will be involved in building and maintaining SDK:s for Android and iOS.

item.title: Item
item.description: Data type used to specify what products are included in an order.

item.title: Example Curl
item.description: curl -X POST https://api.payfunc.com/order \ -u "Bearer <your api key>" \ -d "number=<your order identifier>" \ -d "items=1337.42" \ -d "currency=EUR" \ -d "payment[type]=card" \ -d "payment[account]=<account id>"

item.title: PayFunc Checkout
item.description: PayFunc Checkout is suited to be the last step of your customer’s order process. Once all order items have been selected through other means, PayFunc Checkout allows your customer to select from available payment options and complete the payment.

item.title: PayFunc Onboard
item.description: PayFunc Onboard is a dialog to onboard customers to PayFunc based services.

item.title: PayFunc Send
item.description: PayFunc Send is a payment solution where a link to PayFunc Checkout is sent to the customer via sms or email.

item.title: Be Productive
item.description: Easy to integrate API:s make you more productive so you can focus on creating your innovation.

item.title: Cloud First
item.description: Our solutions are designed for the requirements of modern cloud based applications. Payments can be initiated directly from the client code and be confirmed for authenticity without any need to double check with our servers first.

item.title: Other
item.description: Some simple data types used in requests to and responses from our endpoints.

item.title: Grow With Us
item.description: Don’t become irrelevant customer for a big company. As a smaller, fast growing company, every customer matters to us.

item.title: Me
item.description: The me endpoint is used for logging in the user.

item.title: Get Started
item.description: Use the “Contact Us” tab in the lower right corner to get in direct contact with us and we help you get you started with your project.

item.title: Uppsala.JS
item.description: We where hosting Uppsala.JS #30. Simon Mika talked about our approach to JSON Web Tokens and Päivö Eerola talked about Card Payments. Slides About PayFunc Authly

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for your application. We will contact you by email as soon as we have read your application.

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for reaching out. We will get back to you with our response.
